statements: SELECT * FROM flag_suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM flag_suspicious_transactions;
SELECT * FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, suspicious_reason FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_amount, suspicious_reason FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-05-15' AND suspicious_reason LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, suspicious_reason FROM flag_suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY flagged_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 102 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, amount, flagged_date FROM transactions JOIN suspicious_transactions ON transactions.transaction_id = suspicious_transactions.transaction_id WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE AND suspicious_transactions.reason = 'Fraud' ORDER BY flagged_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, is_suspicious FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND transaction_date < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT amount, transaction_date, customer_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE resolved = FALSE AND flagger_id = 54321;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount <= 500 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT account_name FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM suspicious_transactions JOIN flags ON suspicious_transactions.flag_id = flags.flag_id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions INNER JOIN flags ON suspicious_transactions.flag_id = flags.flag_id
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_reason = 'Suspicious Activity';
SELECT location_name, flag_count FROM flagged_locations ORDER BY flag_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions INNER JOIN flagged_transactions ON suspicious_transactions.transaction_id = flagged_transactions.transaction_id
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT MAX(flag_count) AS max_flag_count, MIN(flag_count) AS min_flag_count FROM flagged_locations WHERE flag_count BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM flagged_accounts WHERE flag_type = 'fraud' AND flag_status = 'active'
